short_summary: Contractors to provide Special Operations Airfield Activation Training and Equipment
description: This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is to establish a Standing Offer for the requirement detailed in the RFSO, to the Identified Users across Canada, excluding locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).",
full_summary:
**[Tender Title]**
**Special Operations Airfield Activation Training**
**[Tender Reference Number]**: WS3852958562-Doc3861306651
**[Amendment Number]**: 2
**Solicitation Reference Number**: WS3852958562
**Publication Date**: 2023-03-06
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-05 14:00 EDT (amended closing time)
**Amendment Date**: 2023-04-12

### [Notice Type] 
**Request for Standing Offer**

The Department of National Defence (DND) solicits proposals from qualified contractors to provide Special Operations Airfield Activation Training and Equipment. This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) aims to establish a contract for a firm period of two (2) years, with three (3) additional one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract period.

**Tender Details**

* **Estimated Contract Value**: Not specified
* **Contract Period**: Up to 2 years, with options for extension
* **Service Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and others

**Eligibility Requirements**

* Contractors must be able to demonstrate experience in providing Special Operations Airfield Activation Training and Equipment.
* Bidders must comply with Canadian trade agreements and regulations.

**Contracting Entity**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of DND
* Contact: Mark Hall (SPAC/PSPC), mark.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Submission Requirements**

* Interested contractors must submit a proposal, along with all required supporting documentation, to the contracting entity by the tender closing date.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Notice URL**:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15371656?extsite=MTUzNzE2NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please refer to the original tender announcement for complete details. We ask you to keep this notice confidential before announcing it to the public. Once you completed, just hit the green button to submit. You can also find the other government tenders we have reviewed on our [_
